000_prologue.title: Prologue
000_prologue.narr-text: This is the prologue of the story, a way to begin your adventure in a nice tone!

001_intro.title: Chapter 1: A new journey!
001_intro.narr-text: Long ago, there was test text who wanted to rule the kingdom of text test...

002_intro.title: Chapter 2: The end.
002_intro.narr-text: After Test Text beat the fearsome Lorem Ipsum, he aquired the throne and lived happily ever after. The End.
